comment: Dr.Devereaux is the best professor ever! She is so passionate about linguistics and made it so much fun to learn. If you are an education major, she will give a lot of great teaching advice. She is so kind and enthusiastic and her energy is UNMATCHED. For the reading checks, just take a detail from every section and you will be okay!! DEF TAKE HER!

She is a nice lady, but she takes a while to grade. She also grades things harshly and grades you on things that do not pertain to the class. There are lots of reading exercises and group work over that reading. There are pop quizzes / written assignments over the reading homework. The work in the class itself, is not really that difficult.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Skip class? You won't pass.--Tough grader

comment: I took her last semester, she had just returned from teaching in the Czech Republic. We were her "guinea pigs" to how she would teach the next class. It was a lot of reading and lectures which made linguistics difficult to fully grasp. She did want our feedback on everything midway and at the end. She didn't grade tough and gave lots of feedback.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Get ready to read--Lecture heavy

comment: Take her!!!!! Ive never been excited to attend an 8am class, I wish I could take this course everyday instead 2 days out of the week. Her methods of teaching linguistic is brilliant. She gives her students the floor to talk and express their ideas after her lectures or assignments given. The semester just started and I am super hype for this class

Dr. Devereaux is an AMAZING professor! I took her linguistics course and it was awesome. She sparked my passion in a subject I originally was scared to learn because of the heavy concepts. As long as you show up to class and do your assignments you will get an A! She assigns a reading every night and lets you take notes on them for a reflection.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Skip class? You won't pass.--LECTURE HEAVY

comment: She the best professor at KSU. Take her!!!

Dr. Devereaux is AWESOME. She is trust worthy and always there to help her students. The class is small and you meet so many nice people that share the same passion as you. Be prepared to read and write upperclassmen, no easy way out. This class comes with an internship which is AMAZING, you definitely learn  a lot with the internship. TAKE HER!!!!

Dr. Devereaux is phenomenal! She is extremely knowledgeable about linguistics and makes it fun to learn about. You won't want to miss her class. She is very clear in her instructions and is eager to help her students succeed. There is no better instructor for linguistics at this university.
Amazing. I loved going to her class. Sometimes she is a tough grader but she is clear about what she wants. I hope to take her again.

I absolutely love this professor! She is so sweet and willing to help you in anyway she can. If something is unclear, just tell her - she'll be happy to clear it up for you. Honestly, best professor I've ever had.
Best professor at Kennesaw. She takes the time to get to know every student. Her classes are incredibly interesting and helpful. I can't recommend her enough.
Great professor! You will not want to miss a day from this class. Simply put, best teacher at KSU.

Dr. Devereaux, is one of the best professors at Kennesaw State University.  She knows her stuff, she is very knowledgable about English and she is willing to share it. She is a very hard grader, but she tells you how to correct what you did wrong so that you will be better as a teacher. The books that she chooses are perfect and you can reuse them.

Best professor at KSU!! Easy, but layered assignments. Takes points off after three absences but you won't want to miss a day. Easy to talk to and helpful. Be prepared to assume the role as teacher in the various assignments. You won't regret it!

Most motivated professor I have had the pleasure of meeting. She takes points off of your grade for missing more than 3 classes, but her class is worth attending! She asks for feedback  and actually uses it (she changed our syllabus after our feedback). She is kind of a hard grader, but knows what she is talking about and is really nice.

Wonderful teacher who obviously has a passion for her field. Class was busy every day, and it was one that I wish went all day. She asks for feedback regularly and actually responds to it; she changed our syllabus after reading feedback. Love Love Love her!!! I recommend her to anyone!!!
